author: remm
msg: - Implement more efficient input handling, similar to output.
- Reader handling is untested (so it probably doesn't work yet).
- String BufferedReader.readLine() is not implemented yet.

author: remm
msg: - Add input support to ByteChunk and CharChunk.
- I don't know if the new method names are well chosen.

author: remm
msg: - Fix caching bug (caused by cut and paste abuse).

author: remm
msg: - The check on the first byte should also be case insensitive.
